org.apache.hcatalog.mapreduce

类 HCatUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hcatalog.mapreduce.HCatUtils

  • public class HCatUtils
extends Object
    Utility methods copied from HCatalog because of visibility restrictions.

        public static org.apache.hcatalog.mapreduce.InputJobInfo getInputJobInfo(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf,
                                                         org.apache.hcatalog.mapreduce.InputJobInfo inputJobInfo)
                                                                  throws IOException
        Returns the given InputJobInfo after populating with data queried from the metadata service.
        参数:
        conf - Configuration
        inputJobInfo - Input job info
        返回:
        Populated input job info
        抛出:
        IOException

        Create a new HCatRecordReader.
        参数:
        storageHandler - Storage handler
        valuesNotInDataCols - Values not in data columns
